alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:49PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A Strong Thunderstorm will impact Lahontan Reservoir... At 147 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silver Springs, or 9 miles southwest of Lahontan Reservoir, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and cause hazardous conditions for anyone outdoors around Lahontan Reservoir . Locations impacted include... Lahontan Reservoir, Fort Churchill Station, Silver Springs and Us 50 At Lyon-Churchill Co Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
